text.autoconfig.autopath.option.enableMo: If enable, every mob  (monsters or animals) will create path.
text.autoconfig.autopath.option.downgrad: Time in seconds the path will become more grassier
text.autoconfig.autopath.option.upgradeT: Time in seconds the path will become more grassless
text.autoconfig.autopath.option.steppedB: Number of times the block is stepped before becoming permanent
text.autoconfig.autopath.option.permanen: Force permanent path to be transform into vanilla path block
